welcome_message_body: Welcome to Noblesville, where small-town charm meets big-city attractions. Explore our historic downtown, known for its unique shops and vibrant dining scene, and discover all the beauty and excitement our city has to offer. Enjoy your stay!

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: This terminal serves all commercial and private flights at Indianapolis Executive Airport.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal A
terminals.description: The main terminal for domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal B
terminals.description: A smaller terminal for regional flights.

wifi.note: Free wifi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Municipal Airport houses all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Municipal Airport handles all air freight and cargo operations.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Indianapolis International Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Concourse A
terminals.description: Concourse A at Indianapolis International Airport serves domestic flights for airlines such as American Airlines, Delta, and Southwest.

terminals.name: Concourse B
terminals.description: Concourse B at Indianapolis International Airport serves domestic and international flights for airlines such as Air Canada, Allegiant, and United.

wifi.note: Passengers can access free WiFi throughout the airport by connecting to the network 'IND Free WiFi'.
